## Answer questions

**Q1** Which department has the highest mean (average) number of seats for its classes? You need to show the department with the highest average first. Which one is the most surprising/interesting to you? **A1** Computer, Math, and Natural Sciences. Most surprising would be Biophysics only having 4.94 â€” would've expected a higher mean.

```{r}
umd_courses |>
  group_by(department) |>
  summarise(
    count_classes = n(),
    total_seats = sum(seats),
    mean_seats = mean(seats),
    median_seats = median(seats),
    # add minimum seats here
    # add maximum seats here
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(mean_seats))
```

**Q2** Find out the greatest number of times any individual class has been offered in our dataset. Your code must show the greatest number of classes first.
**A2** CMSC798

```{r}
umd_courses |>
  group_by(id) |>
  summarise(
    count_classes = n(),
    max_sections = max(sections)
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(max_sections))
```

**Q3** Count the number of courses for each instructor and department. Which instructor has taught the most?
**A3** Monique Koppel

```{r}
umd_courses |>
  group_by(department, instructors) |>
  summarise(
    count_classes = n(),
    total_sections = sum(sections)
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(total_sections))
```
